content:
Harshith P Rao
harshithprao@gmail.com 9019826552 Bengaluru, India harshith-p-rao-b8a2851b7
SUMMARY Currently working as Associate Technical Engineer at Kyndryl. Having hands-on experience 
on various cloud providers, DevOps tools and server management. Looking forward to 
challenging roles that provide me opportunity to showcase my skills
WORK 
EXPERIENCEKyndryl
Associate Technical Engineer Aug 2023 - Present
•Set up cron jobs on Linux servers to automatically remove inactive user IDs (not logged in 
for 30+ days), improving access security and compliance.
•Helped maintain secure access control policies, supporting smoother IAM processes and 
better system security.
•Created and managed privileged groups in Linux, ensuring only authorized users could 
access critical systems and resources.
EDUCATION Reva University
Bachelor of Science - BSc(Honors) in Cloud Computing and Big Data - 8.4
June 2020 - June 2023
PROJECT DevSecOps Project
••Development: Designed and implemented a user-friendly Netﬂix clone application using 
TypeScript, with media streaming functionality as a core feature
•• Cloud Hosting and Containerization: Deployed the application on AWS, and containerized 
application using Docker to ensure consistent environments. 
•• CI/CD and Code Quality: Automated builds, testing and deployments through a Jenkins 
CI/CD pipeline, integrating SonarQube for static code analysis to maintain high code quality 
and security. 
••Monitoring and Visualization: Used Prometheus for real-time monitoring and metrics 
collection, and leveraged Grafana to visualize system performance and enable faster issue 
resolution.
2-Tier Containerized App
•Designed a 2-tier application architecture with a React frontend, Django backend, MySQL 
database, and Nginx as a reverse proxy.
•Conﬁgured container networking and orchestrated the setup using Docker Compose.
•Gained hands-on experience in debugging with Docker logs and ensuring seamless 
integration between all components.
•Deployed the application on a cloud provider (AWS)
SKILLS •Programming Languages: Golang, Python, 
Java
•Cloud Platforms: AWS, Azure, GCP
•Operating System: Linux, Unix, Windows
•Version Control Systems: Git, GitHub•CI/CD: Jenkins
•Monitoring Tools: Prometheus, Grafana
•Devops Tools: Docker, SonarQube, 
Terraform, Ansible
CERTIFICATE Microsoft Certiﬁed: Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900)
Microsoft: Security, Compliance, and Identity Fundamentals (SC-900)
Microsoft: Introduction to Programming Using Python
Microsoft Certiﬁed: Azure AI Fundamentals (AI-900)
